verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Ye <S%H859><s%> have kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, and have obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you:

Ye have not <S%H3808><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> but have kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And now <S%H6258><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto your brethren, <S%H251><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he promised <S%H1696><s%> them: therefore now <S%H6258><s%> return <S%H6437><s%> ye, and get <S%H1980><s%> you unto your tents, <S%H168><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession, <S%H272><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> take diligent <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> and the law, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> you, to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and to walk <S%H1980><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and to cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him, and to serve <S%H5647><s%> him with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, and sent them away: <S%H7971><s%> and they went <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> their tents. <S%H168><s%>

Now to the one half <S%H2677><s%> of the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> possession in Bashan: <S%H1316><s%> but unto the other half <S%H2677><s%> thereof gave <S%H5414><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%> And when <S%H3588><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent them away <S%H7971><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> their tents, <S%H168><s%> then he blessed <S%H1288><s%> them,

And he spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Return <S%H7725><s%> with much <S%H7227><s%> riches <S%H5233><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> your tents, <S%H168><s%> and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> cattle, <S%H4735><s%> with silver, <S%H3701><s%> and with gold, <S%H2091><s%> and with brass, <S%H5178><s%> and with iron, <S%H1270><s%> and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> raiment: <S%H8008><s%> divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> your brethren. <S%H251><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and departed <S%H1980><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Shiloh, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7887><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the country <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of their possession, <S%H272><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> they were possessed, <S%H270><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And when they came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the borders <S%H1552><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> to see <S%H4758><s%> to.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H853><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> over against <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the borders <S%H1552><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the passage <S%H1552><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> at Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> to go <S%H5927><s%> up to war <S%H6635><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> <S%H853><s%> Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%>

And with <S%H5973><s%> him ten <S%H6235><s%> princes, <S%H5387><s%> of each chief <S%H5387><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H5387><s%> <S%H259><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> a prince <S%H1><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and each one <S%H376><s%> was a head <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> among the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And they came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and they spoke <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> trespass <S%H4604><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye have committed <S%H4603><s%> against the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to turn away <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in that ye have built <S%H1129><s%> you an altar, <S%H4196><s%> that ye might rebel <S%H4775><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> against the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>

Is <S%H853><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%> too little <S%H4592><s%> for us, from <S%H4480><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we are not <S%H3808><s%> cleansed <S%H2891><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> although there was <S%H1961><s%> a plague <S%H5063><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

But that ye <S%H859><s%> must turn away <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> and it will be, <S%H1961><s%> seeing ye <S%H859><s%> rebel <S%H4775><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> he will be wroth <S%H7107><s%> with <S%H413><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Notwithstanding, <S%H389><s%> if <S%H518><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%> be unclean, <S%H2931><s%> then pass ye over <S%H5674><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> dwelleth, <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8033><s%> and take possession <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> us: but rebel <S%H4775><s%> not <S%H408><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> rebel <S%H4775><s%> against us, in building <S%H1129><s%> you an altar <S%H4196><s%> beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1107><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

Did not <S%H3808><s%> Achan <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> in the accursed thing, <S%H2764><s%> and wrath <S%H7110><s%> fell <S%H1961><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> and that <S%H1931><s%> man <S%H376><s%> perished <S%H1478><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> alone <S%H259><s%> in his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H853><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> knoweth, <S%H3045><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall know; <S%H3045><s%> if <S%H518><s%> it be in rebellion, <S%H4777><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> in transgression <S%H4604><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> (save <S%H3467><s%> us not <S%H408><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day,) <S%H3117><s%>

That we have built <S%H1129><s%> us an altar <S%H4196><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> from following <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> to offer <S%H5927><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> or if <S%H518><s%> to offer <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> let the LORD <S%H3068><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> require <S%H1245><s%> it;

And if <S%H518><s%> we have not <S%H3808><s%> rather done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> it <S%H2063><s%> for fear <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1674><s%> of this thing, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> In time to come <S%H4279><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> might speak <S%H559><s%> unto our children, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have ye to do with the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> a border <S%H1366><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us and you, ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad; <S%H1410><s%> ye have no <S%H369><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> in the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> so shall your children <S%H1121><s%> make <S%H853><s%> our children <S%H1121><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> from fearing <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore we said, <S%H559><s%> Let us now <S%H4994><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> us <S%H853><s%> an altar, <S%H4196><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> for burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, nor <S%H3808><s%> for sacrifice: <S%H2077><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> that it <S%H1931><s%> may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us, and you, and our generations <S%H1755><s%> after <S%H310><s%> us, that we might do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him with our burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and with our sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> and with our peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%> that your children <S%H1121><s%> may not <S%H3808><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to our children <S%H1121><s%> in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> Ye have no <S%H369><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore said <S%H559><s%> we, that it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> they should so say <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> us or to <S%H413><s%> our generations <S%H1755><s%> in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> that we may say <S%H559><s%> again, Behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> our fathers <S%H1><s%> made, <S%H6213><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> for burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> for sacrifices; <S%H2077><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a witness <S%H5707><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us and you.

God forbid <S%H2486><s%> that we <S%H4480><s%> should rebel <S%H4775><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> for burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> for meat offerings, <S%H4503><s%> or for sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> his tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And when Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him, heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> spoke, <S%H1696><s%> it pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> them.

And Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> This day <S%H3117><s%> we perceive <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> us, because <S%H834><s%> ye have not <S%H3808><s%> committed <S%H4603><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> now <S%H227><s%> ye have delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
